statements: SELECT * FROM Individualized_Education_Plans;
SELECT student_name, iep_goal FROM Individualized_Education_Plans WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, iep_objectives FROM Individualized_Education_Plans WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Individualized_Education_Plans WHERE iep_reviews IS NULL;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Individualized_Education_Plans ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, iep_goal, iep_objectives, iep_reviews FROM Individualized_Education_Plans WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Individualized_Education_Plans WHERE student_id = 2 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, iep_objectives FROM Individualized_Education_Plans WHERE student_id = 3 AND student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_ieps FROM Individualized_Education_Plans;
SELECT student_id, student_name, LENGTH(iep_goal) AS iep_goal_length FROM Individualized_Education_Plans WHERE LENGTH(iep_goal) > 100 ORDER BY iep_goal_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age DESC, student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, age, grade_level FROM students WHERE iep_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, age, iep_status FROM students WHERE grade_level = 'High School' AND age >= 16;
SELECT student_name, iep_goal FROM students s JOIN iep_tracking i ON s.student_id = i.student_id;
SELECT student_name, iep_start_date, iep_end_date FROM students s JOIN iep_tracking i ON s.student_id = i.student_id WHERE iep_start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 15
SELECT student_name, age FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE iep_status = TRUE
SELECT student_name, age, grade_level FROM students ORDER BY grade_level ASC, age DESC
SELECT s.student_name, t.iep_start_date, t.iep_end_date FROM students s JOIN iep_tracking t ON s.student_id = t.student_id
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT full_name, birthdate FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT full_name, grade_level FROM Students WHERE birthdate >= '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM IEPGoals ORDER BY target_completion_date DESC;
SELECT goal_description, target_completion_date FROM IEPGoals WHERE target_completion_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT full_name, birthdate FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT full_name, birthdate, grade_level FROM Students WHERE iep_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM IEPGoals WHERE target_completion_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT Students.full_name, IEPProgress.progress_description, IEPProgress.date_recorded FROM Students JOIN IEPGoals ON Students.student_id = IEPGoals.student_id JOIN IEPProgress ON IEPGoals.goal_id = IEPProgress.goal_id;

SELECT Students.full_name, IEPGoals.goal_description, IEPProgress.progress_description FROM Students JOIN IEPGoals ON Students.student_id = IEPGoals.student_id JOIN IEPProgress ON IEPGoals.goal_id = IEPProgress.goal_id WHERE Students.full_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Student;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade FROM Student ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM IEP WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT teacher_id, first_name, last_name FROM Teacher WHERE email LIKE '%@school.com';
SELECT school_name, address FROM School ORDER BY school_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Student WHERE grade > 10 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade FROM Student JOIN IEP ON Student.student_id = IEP.student_id WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT DISTINCT school_name, address FROM School WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT teacher_id, first_name, email FROM Teacher WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Student WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2010-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE age > 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students ORDER BY last_name DESC;

SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, t.first_name AS teacher_first_name, t.last_name AS teacher_last_name FROM students s JOIN student_teacher_mapping stm ON s.student_id = stm.student_id JOIN teachers t ON stm.teacher_id = t.teacher_id;
SELECT sp.progress_date, sp.progress_report, ip.goals FROM iep_progress sp JOIN iep_plans ip ON sp.plan_id = ip.plan_id WHERE sp.progress_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 10 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students JOIN iep_plans ON students.student_id = iep_plans.student_id WHERE date_issued > '2022-01-01';

SELECT teachers.first_name, teachers.department, students.first_name, students.last_name FROM teachers JOIN student_teacher_mapping ON teachers.teacher_id = student_teacher_mapping.teacher_id JOIN students ON student_teacher_mapping.student_id = students.student_id;

SELECT students.first_name, students.grade_level, COUNT(iep_plans.plan_id) AS num_plans FROM students LEFT JOIN iep_plans ON students.student_id = iep_plans.student_id GROUP BY students.first_name, students.grade_level HAVING num_plans > 1;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, MAX(grade_level) AS max_grade FROM students WHERE grade_level >= 10;
